src:
FOTO: Gemerlap Pekan Halloween di Penjuru Dunia
04 Nov 2019, 17:02 by AP PHOTO/AFP PHOTO, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Halloween memang telah berlalu, namun keriaannya di penjuru dunia masih terasa hingga akhir pekan kemarin.


Salah satu pengunjung pesta kostum Halloween di Essen, Jerman. Halloween memang telah berlalu, namun keriaannya di penjuru dunia masih terasa hingga akhir pekan kemarin. (AFP/Ina Fassbender)



Walau tengah didera aksi demo, warga Santiago, Chile, masih tetap bersuka cita merayakan Halloween tahun ini. (AP Photo/Rodrigo Abd)



Salah satu penampil dalam festival Day of the Dead di Meksiko. (AP Photo/Ginnette Riquelme)



Kota Bucharest di Romania merayakan Halloween dengan festival mengukir labu tahunan yang disebut terbesar di Eropa. Ada 30 ribu labu yang disediakan tahun ini. (AP Photo/Vadim Ghirda)  



Musim dingin tak menghalau keseruan pesta kostum ala zombie dalam perayaan Halloween di Essen, Jerman. (AFP/Ina Fassbender)



Halloween, yang diambil dari kalimat 'All Hallows' Eve', dirayakan sebelum All Saints' Day pada 1 November. (Getty Images/AFP/Jeenah Moon)



Kawasan Sixth Avenue menjadi pusat perayaan Halloween di New York, Amerika Serikat. (AFP/Johannes Eisele)



Tak hanya orang-orang berkostum seram, perayaan Halloween di New York, Amerika Serikat, juga dimeriahkan dengan arak-arakan balon dan boneka berbentuk seram. (AFP/Johannes Eisele)



Orang-orang dengan kostum Zombie merayakan Halloween di Sixth Avenue, New York, Amerika Serikat. (AFP/Johannes Eisele)



Seorang pria mengenakan kostum dinosaurus dalam perayaan Halloween di Hong Kong. Bersamaan dengan aksi protes, massa demo diminta mengenakan pakaian seram untuk memperingati Halloween selagi berunjuk rasa. (AP Photo/Vincent Yu)
text:
PHOTOS: Sparkling Halloween Week Around the World
Nov 04 2019, 17:02 by AP PHOTO / AFP PHOTO, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Halloween has indeed passed, but the excitement around the world is still felt until last weekend.


One of the visitors to a Halloween costume party in Essen, Germany. Halloween has indeed passed, but the excitement around the world is still felt until last weekend. (AFP / Ina Fassbender)



Despite the demonstration, residents of Santiago, Chile, still rejoice to celebrate Halloween this year. (AP Photo / Rodrigo Abd)



One of the performers at the Day of the Dead festival in Mexico. (AP Photo / Ginnette Riquelme)



The city of Bucharest in Romania celebrates Halloween with the annual biggest pumpkin carving festival called in Europe. There are 30 thousand pumpkins provided this year. (AP Photo / Vadim Ghirda)



Winter does not dispel the excitement of a zombie costume party at Halloween celebrations in Essen, Germany. (AFP / Ina Fassbender)



Halloween, taken from the phrase 'All Hallows' Eve ', is celebrated before All Saints' Day on November 1. (Getty Images / AFP / Jeenah Moon)



The Sixth Avenue area is the center of Halloween celebrations in New York, United States. (AFP / Johannes Eisele)



Not only are people wearing scary costumes, Halloween celebrations in New York, United States, also enlivened by a procession of balloons and spooky shaped dolls. (AFP / Johannes Eisele)



People in Zombie costumes celebrate Halloween on Sixth Avenue, New York, United States. (AFP / Johannes Eisele)



A man wearing a dinosaur costume during Halloween celebrations in Hong Kong. Along with the protest, the demonstrators were asked to wear scary clothes to commemorate Halloween while demonstrating. (AP Photo / Vincent Yu)
